name: SmartTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, open smart tip of the day”
”Alexa, ask smart tip of the day for a tip”
”Alexa, ask smart tip of the day to help me save time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart tip of the day
des: Looking for ways to save some time in your busy life? Wishing you could make your money stretch a little further? Just ask Alexa to open Smart Tip of the Day and you'll get a daily tip for saving time and money. This skill is packed with everything from cooking tips to general 'life hacks' that you may have never thought of. Content is provided by GateHouse Media's lifestyle brand Time & Money.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
